name: XMIT (GGJ18 entry)
description:
Xmit is a deep space logistics management game where YOU are in charge of a space station controlling cargo sent to deep space. Armed with your trusty Mass Transmitter System, you get to decide who gets what. Bargain, trade, chat and conquer the deep space logistics trade!

https://globalgamejam.org/2018/games/xmit
